{{Description|Offer the [[Electro Sigil]]s to the [[Sacred Sakura]] of the [[Grand Narukami Shrine]] in exchange for its favor.}}
'''Sacred Sakura's Favor''' is an [[Offering]] System that is leveled with [[Electro Sigil]]s. It can be found at the [[Sacred Sakura]] in [[Grand Narukami Shrine]], [[Narukami Island]], [[Inazuma]].

Sacred Sakura's Favor is unlocked by reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 30 and completing the quest [[Ritou Escape Plan]].

Prior to [[Version 2.4]], the maximum level was limited to 20, 30, and 40 in Versions 2.0, 2.1, and 2.2-2.3 respectively despite the possibility of obtaining more than enough Electro Sigils. The game prevented players from offering more by displaying the following error: ''"You have reached the maximum Sacred Sakura's Favor Level for this version."''

==Rewards==
Raising the Sacred Sakura's Favor's level requires {{Item|Electro Sigil|x=25}} and must be offered in groups of 25. A total of 1,250 [[Electro Sigil]]s are required to reach the maximum level. Reaching the maximum level will grant the [[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I]] achievement "Divine Roots."

All levels, except levels 40 and 50, will reward: {{Card|Adventure EXP|200}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10}}{{Card|Mora|50,000}}

Level 40 will instead reward: {{Card|Silken Print|1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10}}{{Card|Mora|50,000}}

Level 50 will instead reward: {{Card|"The Spring Mist Weaves the Sakura Rain"|1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10}}{{Card|Mora|50,000}}

Each respective level will also reward:
